brief_summary.textblock:
The use of a biodegradable polymer has the potential to reduce the sustained inflammatory
      response of the arterial wall, facilitating re-endothelialization and minimizing the risk of
      thrombus formation and late restenosis. In the study, we are going to two biodegradable
      polymer stents, Orsiro and BioMatrix, especially regarding the stent strut coverage by
      optical coherence tomography at 3 months after stent implantation.

      The primary objective of this study is to test the hypothesis that Orsiro is non-inferior to
      Biomatrix in terms of stent strut coverage by optical coherence tomography at 3 months. The
      secondary endpoint is clinical outcomes up to 1 year.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Biodegradable Stents: Orsiro and BioMatrix

detailed_description.textblock:
The use of a biodegradable polymer has the potential to reduce the sustained inflammatory
      response of the arterial wall, facilitating re-endothelialization and minimizing the risk of
      thrombus formation and late restenosis. In the study, we are going to two biodegradable
      polymer stents, Orsiro and BioMatrix, especially regarding the stent strut coverage by
      optical coherence tomography at 3 months after stent implantation.

      The primary objective of this study is to test the hypothesis that Orsiro is non-inferior to
      Biomatrix in terms of stent strut coverage by optical coherence tomography at 3 months. The
      secondary endpoint is clinical outcomes up to 1 year.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Patients ≥ 20 years old

          2. Patients in the treatment of subjects with all-comer who are to undergo PCI

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Pregnant women or women with potential childbearing

          2. Life expectancy < 1 year

intervention.description: Drug-eluting biodegradable stent BioMatrix or BioMatrix Flex implantation
intervention.intervention_name: Drug-eluting biodegradable stent BioMatrix or BioMatrix Flex implantation

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Biodegradable Stents: Orsiro and BioMatrix

oversight_info.authority: Korea: Ministry of Food and Drug Safety

primary_outcome.description: The percentage of stent uncoverage measured by optical coherence tomography
primary_outcome.measure: Neointimal coverage at 3 month after stent implantation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
